column5: My fishin buddy and I headin up to on of our get away spots for a few days last weekend. If some members recall I've posted up some pics if nice bass in the past from this place and I'm happy to say my buddy Dave got his OB largie and me a PB samllie. I know I don't post here very much life, work and all, (more creeper) but thought some may enjoy. Me and some random rock My new back lake 12 footer My buddy Dave with his PB largie. No weight or measurement. Myself with a PB smallie. Some random pics.      All fish were realeased to be caught another day. All in all the numbers were down, but the size made up for it. Tight lines, Pidge.
Looks like Bass heaven there - Plus no cottages on the shoreline!!!
I like the rock picture the best all of the other ones have some stupid fish in them...   Nice lake X me friend.   Art
Nice report,looks like a beauty spot!!!Nice fish as well.
Them some tank bass, and a nice muskie to top it off too. Damn good spot you got there.
I recognize that big rock  looks like a great fishing trip       PS  didn't really  know it.... lol
Nice .Real nice. Bass heaven area.    No you dont,but WE DO,know a spot thats just like it. Been awhile since we fished it.
Thanks guys for the kind words. It's not every day I can get out and fish, but it's spots like this that make up for it. Terry you had me goin for a second lol.
nice bass and bonus muskie, oh, and yes, feel free to PM me the lake name and GPS coordinates (Hahaha)
Way to go. That's what it's all about right there!!
That lake X has everything in it.
nice muskie, I have an itch to catch one
Looks like a great spot there great pics thanks for sharing.
That's some good fishing.  Sweet looking water as well. Thanks for the report.
